snippet: Shares of Freeport tumbled more than 13 percent on Wednesday, after the mining concern announced plans to buy two oil and gas explorers, a move that that many investors are rejecting outright.
abstract: Shares of Freeport tumbled more than 13 percent on Wednesday, after the mining concern announced plans to buy two oil and gas explorers, a move that that many investors are rejecting outright.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Shares of Freeport Sink as Investors Assail Deals
